movies.title: Give the Devil His Due
movies.plot: Petr's greedy stepmother steals everything from her stepson. Meanwhile, Petr meets two daughters of a local duke. He falls in love with one of them, but she is very proud and Petr means nothing to her. The second daughter Adelka is kind and humble and falls in love with Petr. Petr meets a devil and together decide to punish the evil ones.
movies.simplePlot: Petr's greedy stepmother steals everything from her stepson. Meanwhile, Petr meets two daughters of a local duke. He falls in love with one of them, but she is very proud and Petr means ...

biography.bio: Vladimír Dlouhý was born on January 10, 1958 in Prague, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]. He was an actor, known for Give the Devil His Due (1985), Arabela se vrací (1993) and Jumping Over Puddles (1971). He was married to Petra Jungmannová and Gabriela Svárovská. He died on June 20, 2010 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Vladimír Dlouhý

biography.bio: Ondrej Vetchy graduated at 1984 at Prague Conservatory in musical-drama department. His first achievement was the part of young devil in one of the best Czech fantasy for children ever - S certy nejsou zerty (There Are No Jokes with Devils) from the director Hynek Bocan. Ondrej Vetchy succeed like only one Czech movie actor at European Film Awards, when he was nominated for the part of cool masher Dan in drama Dum pro dva. He achieved in comedies as well as in dramas. His most popular characters are soldier Kefalin in comedy Cerni baroni (Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year), grave digger Broz in Oscar awarded movie by Jan Sverak Kolya (Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year), Kvido's father in Bajecna leta pod psa (Wonderful Years that Sucks, Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year, Award of Cinema Magazine for Best Actor), pilot in the Tmavomodry svet (Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year, Award of Cinema Magazine for Best Actor) and irresponsible son in Babi leto (Autumn Spring). Ondrej Vetchy is a member of very famous Czech theatre Cinoherni klub and he is also very successful in work for TV. Ondrej Vetchy belongs to the most popular Czech actors ever.
biography.name: Ondrej Vetchý

biography.bio: Jana Dítetová was born on October 7, 1926 in Pilsen, Czechoslovakia as Jana Kalabzová. She was an actress, known for The Joke (1969), Give the Devil His Due (1985) and Les têtes de chiens (1955). She was married to Wladimir Vlcek and Josef Vinklár. She died on November 9, 1993 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Jana Dítetová

biography.bio: Josef Kemr was born on June 20, 1922 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Marketa Lazarová (1967), Secluded, Near Woods (1976) and Witchhammer (1970). He was married to Eva Foustková. He died on January 15, 1995 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Josef Kemr

biography.bio: Viktor Preiss was born on March 13, 1947 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor and director, known for Dark Blue World (2001), Give the Devil His Due (1985) and Smart Philip (2003).
biography.name: Viktor Preiss

biography.bio: Jaroslava Kretschmerová was born on September 1, 1955 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Greedy Guts (2000), Slunce, seno, erotika (1991) and Give the Devil His Due (1985).
biography.name: Jaroslava Kretschmerová

biography.bio: Dana Bartunková was born on September 10, 1957 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Give the Devil His Due (1985), Skleníková Venusa (1986) and Kaspar Hauser (1993).
biography.name: Dana Bartunková

biography.bio: Monika Pelcová was born on December 18, 1965 in Olomouc, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Give the Devil His Due (1985) and Top star magazín (2008).
biography.name: Monika Pelcová

biography.bio: Karel Hermánek was born on October 17, 1947 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Gympl s (r)ucením omezeným (2012), Stalingrad (1993) and Kolya (1996). He is married to Hana Hermánková. They have three children.
biography.name: Karel Hermánek

biography.bio: Petr Nározný was born on April 14, 1938 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Hospoda (1996), Pojistovna stestí (2004) and Já nejsem já (1986).
biography.name: Petr Nározný

biography.bio: Václav Vydra was born on January 7, 1956 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for VIP Prostreno! (2011), Gympl s (r)ucením omezeným (2012) and Kamenák 3 (2005).
biography.name: Václav Vydra

biography.bio: Frantisek Vicena was born on June 24, 1933 in Znojmo, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Key (1971), Rychlík do Ostravy (1961) and The Liberation of Prague (1978). He died on October 15, 1984 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Frantisek Vicena

biography.bio: Jan Skopecek was born on September 19, 1925 in Litomerice, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Cesta domu (1960), Nemaluj si certa na zed (1971) and Jak se stal hastrman v Rokytnici sevcem (1970). He was previously married to Vera Tichánková.
biography.name: Jan Skopecek

biography.bio: Vladimír Hrubý was born on March 23, 1924 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Dinner for Adele (1978), The Three Veterans (1984) and Soudce Stokroc (1967). He died on July 30, 1986 in Prague.
biography.name: Vladimír Hrubý

biography.bio: Ivana Andrlová was born on October 28, 1960 in Vysoké Mýto, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Podnájemníci (1976), O zrzave Andule (1988) and Chytrá princezna (1984).
biography.name: Ivana Andrlová

awards.award: Lucas - International Festival of Films for Children and Young People 1985
